Title: Girl with Green Eyes
Actors: Peter Finch, Rita Tushingham, Lynn Redgrave, Marie Kean
Plot: An awkward young Irish farm girl Kate Brady moves to Dublin and shares a room with funny, outgoing Baba Brennan, where she soon meets Eugene Gaillard, a middle-aged writer, who is immediately attracted to the shy and innocent Kate, ignoring the more sophisticated Baba.
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 3 nominations.
